japanese: 神羅はその事故の責任をコレル村のオレたちに押しつけた。反対派のしわざだと言ってな

definitions: 賛成[さんせい] (n, vs, adj-no) approval, agreement, support, favour, favor
english: Never should've gone along with the building of the reactor…
japanese: オレさえ魔晄炉に賛成しなければ……

definitions: 女房[にょうぼう] (n) wife (esp. one's own wife),court lady, female court attache, woman who served at the imperial palace,woman (esp. as a love interest)
english: Not only did they take advantage of me… But I lost my wife, Myrna, too…
japanese: あまい言葉にのせられたあげく女房を……ミーナを失い……

definitions: ダイン (n) dyne
english: Dyne was my best friend. We were close ever since we were kids…
japanese: ダインは親友だったぜ。ガキのころからのよう……

definitions: 不幸[ふこう] (n) unhappiness, sorrow, misfortune, disaster, accident,death (usu. of a relative), bereavement
english: Everything Shinra does seems to make everyone miserable…
japanese: 神羅のやることはみんな不幸にしてしまうのね…

definitions: 同情[どうじょう] (n, vs) sympathy, compassion, feeling pity for
english: I'm not sympathizing with BARRET! He never should have trusted Shinra, Inc.
japanese: アタシはBARRETに同情なんてしないよ！神羅を信じたのが悪いのさ

definitions: 葡[ぽ] (n, n-pref, n-suf) Portugal
波[ぽ] (n, n-suf, n-pref) Poland
english: The Gold Saucer reopened. Why don't you go play hard and clear your heads as well as your pockets?
japanese: ゴールドソーサーが再開したよ。こんな時だからこそ、遊んで頭もサイフもカラッポにしたらどうだい？

definitions: 有り金[ありがね] (n) money on hand
english: I'm gonna use all my life savings before Meteor hits!
japanese: メテオが落ちる前にゴールドソーサーで有り金を全部使ってやるぜ！

definitions: 分かる[わかる] (v5r, vi) to understand, to comprehend, to grasp, to see, to get, to follow,to become clear, to be known, to be discovered, to be realized, to be realised, to be found out
english: I know how you feel, but what if Meteor doesn't hit us? What are you gonna do then?
japanese: あせる気持ちは分かるけどよ。メテオが落ちなかったらそのあと、どうするんだよ？

definitions: 誇る[ほこる] (v5r, vi) to boast of, to be proud of
english: It may be dusty and poor,
japanese: ほこりっぽくて

definitions: 長閑[のどか] (adj-na) tranquil, calm, quiet, peaceful
english: but it's calm…
japanese: のどかで、まずしくて……

definitions: 小っぽけ[ちっぽけ] (adj-na) very small, tiny
english: It's a real small town.
japanese: そんなちっぽけな村だった。

definitions: 村長[そんちょう] (n) village headman, village mayor
english: Village Headman
japanese: 村長

definitions: 命がけ[いのちがけ] (n, adj-no) putting one's life on the line, staking one's life (on), risking one's life, life and death situation
english: The coal's been ours for generations. Our fathers, and theirs before them, risked their lives for it.
japanese: コレルの炭坑は、俺たちのじいさんたち、おやじたちが命がけで守ってきたものだ

definitions: 石炭[せきたん] (n) coal
english: But listen, Dyne. No one uses coal nowadays. It's the sign of the times.
japanese: でもよ、ダイン。今の時代、石炭なんて誰も使わない。時代にはさからえないんだ

definitions: 暁[あかつき] (n) dawn, daybreak,event (e.g. "in the event of ..."), occasion, occurrence
english: It'll be all right, Dyne. Shinra, Inc. will guarantee your livelihood once the Mako Reactor is completed.
japanese: だいじょうぶですよ、ダインさん。魔晄炉完成のあかつきには我々神羅カンパニーがみなさんの生活を保障します

definitions: 保証[ほしょう] (n, vs) guarantee, security, assurance, pledge, warranty
english: It'll be all right, Dyne. Shinra, Inc. will guarantee your livelihood once the Mako Reactor is completed.
japanese: だいじょうぶですよ、ダインさん。魔晄炉完成のあかつきには我々神羅カンパニーがみなさんの生活を保障します

definitions: 出来事[できごと] (n) incident, affair, happening, event
english: It happened when Dyne and I were out of town for a few days.
japanese: オレとダインが村を離れているほんのわずかな時間の出来事だった。

definitions: 焼き払う[やきはらう] (v5u, vt) to burn down (to the ground), to clear away by burning, to reduce to ashes, to burn off
english: Corel was burned down by the Shinra troops.
japanese: コレル村は神羅の軍によってやきはらわれてしまったんだ。

definitions: 村人[むらびと] (n) villager
english: All the townspeople…
japanese: 大勢の村人たちも……
